@template access

{{html:
<style>
	.loginFieldName2{
		width: 135px;
	}
</style>
<div class="account-container stacked" ng-app="cloudscalers" ng-controller="ActivateUserController">
    <div class="content clearfix padding">
	    <div class="login-symbol signUpForm">
	        <h1 class="white-header txt-white txt-bold txt-center">Activate user</h1>
	        <form name="resetpasswordform" ng-submit="activateUserFunc()" ng-hide="resetpasswordresult.succeeded">
	            <div class="login-fields margin-bottom-medium">
	                <div class="alert alert-error ng-hide" ng-show="activateUser.error">{[activateUser.error]}</div>
	                <div class="field">
	                    <div class="loginField">
	                        <label class="loginFieldName loginFieldName2">Password:</label>
	                        <div class="inputWrap">
	                            <input type="password" required class="inputLogin" id="password" name="password" value="" ng-model="activateUser.password"/>
	                        </div>
	                    </div>
	                </div>
	                <div class="field">
	                    <div class="loginField">
	                        <label class="loginFieldName loginFieldName2">Confirm password:</label>
	                        <div class="inputWrap">
	                            <input type="password" required class="inputLogin" id="confirmPassword" name="confirmPassword" value="" ng-model="activateUser.confirmPassword"/>
	                        </div>
	                    </div>
	                </div>
	            </div>
				<input type="submit" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg btn-block primaryMine" value="Activate" / >
	        </form>
	    </div>
    </div>
</div>
<script src="/$$space/.files/js/services/UserServices.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script src="/$$space/.files/js/controllers/ActivateUserController.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
}}
